resources.string: Attention: Do not unplug the device, or it may cause unspecified errors!
CI Plus Network is not initialised. You must search for updated network!
CI Plus Network search schedule time is reached. You may search for updated network!
CI Plus Network is unavailable. You must search for updated network!
CI Plus Network has changed. You may search for updated network!

Suitable for all audiences. Programmes may contain mild violence, language and mature situations.
Suitable for ages 13 and above. Programmes may contain mild to moderate language and mild violence and sexual references.
Suitable for ages 16 and above. Programmes may contain more intensive violence and coarse language, partial nudity and moderate sexual references.
Suitable for mature audiences only. Programmes contain strong violence, coarse language and explicit sexual references.

Material classified AV is suitable for viewing only by persons aged 15 years or over. It is unsuitable for MA classification because of the intensity and/or frequency of violence, or because violence is central to the theme. In other respects, the requirements of the classification are identical to the MA classification.
Material classified C is intended for children (other than pre-school children) who are younger than 14 years of age.
Material classified G is not necessarily intended for children but it must be very mild in impact and must not contain any matter likely to be unsuitable for children to watch without supervision.
Material classified M is for mature audiences. It is recommended for viewing only by persons aged 15 years or above.

Material classified MA is suitable for viewing only by persons aged 15 years or over because of the intensity and/or frequency of violence, sexual depictions, or coarse language, adult themes or drug use. The impact may be strong.
Material classified P is intended for pre-school children.
Material classified PG may contain adult themes or concepts but must be mild in impact and remain suitable for children to watch with supervision.
Material classified R is legally restricted to adults. Some material classified R may be offensive to sections of the adult community.

Programming with this classification contains themes or content which might not be suitable for viewers under the age of 14. Parents are strongly advised to exercise caution in permitting viewing by pre-teens and early teens without parent/guardian supervision, as programming with this classification could deal with mature and societal issues in a realistic fashion.
This programming is intended for viewers 18 years and older.
This programming is intended for younger children under the age of 8 years old.
This programming is intended for youngsters aged 8 years and above. It is suggested that a parent/guardian co-view programming assigned with this classification with children under the age of 8.
Exempt programming includes: news, sports, documentaries and other information programming; chat shows, music videos and variety programming.
This programming is intended for all age groups and therefore appropriate viewing for the entire family.

This programming, while intended for a general audience, may not be suitable for younger children (under the age of 8). Parents/guardians should be aware that there might be content which some may consider inappropriate for unsupervised viewing by children in the 8-13 age range.
The programme is appropriate for viewing by persons 13 years of age or older. Children under 13 may be admitted only if accompanied by an adult.

The programme is appropriate for viewing by persons 16 years of age or older. Programmes with this rating present troubling themes, situations or behaviours, and adopt a more direct point of view about things.

The programme is appropriate for viewing by persons 18 years of age or older. Programmes reserved for adults most often deal primarily with the representation of explicit sexual encounters. They may also be extremely violent, showing scenes of hyperrealistic cruelty, torture and horror.

The programme is suitable for the general public but could contain mild or occasional violence that may disturb young children. Viewing with adult supervision is therefore recommended for young children (age 8 and under).
The programme is appropriate for viewing by persons of all ages. A programme with a G rating might offend the sensibilities of children under 8 years of age.
Programmes may contain material inappropriate for children under 12, and therefore parental discretion is advised.
Programmes may contain material inappropriate for audiences under the age of 15, and therefore parental discretion is advised.
Programmes may contain material inappropriate for audiences under the age of 19, and thus are not suitable for youngsters under 19.
Programmes may contain material inappropriate for children under 7, and therefore parental discretion is advised.
Programmes do not contain material that is inappropriate for any age, and thus are suitable for everyone.
Children under 10 are prohibited from watching this programme/film.
Children under 13 are prohibited from watching this programme/film.
Children under 16 are prohibited from watching this programme/film.
Children under 18 are prohibited from watching this programme/film.
Children under 10 may watch this programme/film, but must be accompanied by an adult.
Children under 13 may watch this programme/film, but must be accompanied by an adult.
this is reserved for films of an extreme sexual nature (pornography).
Suitable for persons aged 18 and above.
Suitable for persons aged 16 and above.
Suitable for all, but parents should guide their children.
Suitable for persons aged 13 and above but parental guidance is advised for children under 13.
Suitable for adults aged 21 and above.
Suitable for people aged 13 and above.
Suitable for people aged 18 and above. And parental guidance for children under 18.
General audiences. Nothing that would offend parents for viewing by children.
No one under 17 years of age admitted. Clearly adult. Children are not admitted.
Parental guidance suggested. May contain some material that parents might not like for their young children.
Parents strongly cautioned. Some material may be inappropriate for children under 13 years of age.
Restricted. Contains some adult material. Parents are urged to learn more about the film before taking their young children.
This programme contains some material that many parents would find unsuitable for children under 14 years of age.
Most parents would find this programme suitable for all ages.
This programme is specifically designed to be viewed by adults and therefore may be unsuitable for children under 17 years of age.
This programme contains material that parents may find unsuitable for younger children. Many parents may want to watch it with their younger children.
This programme is designed to be appropriate for all children.
This programme is designed for children aged 7 and above.

Software update. A new recommended software update is available. The update might take some time and the screen might go black. Do not turn off TV during the update. Do you want to update now? It will start automatically in %s second(s)
This process may take up to 25 minutes.
The software has been downloaded successfully. Do you want to start flashing?
Programming failed. Try it again?\10\10Please call service centre.
Your system is up to date.
Software update. A new recommended software update is available. The update might take some time and the screen might go black. Do not turn off TV during the update. Do you want to update now?
Unable to download the software. Do you want to retry?
Software is downloaded successfully! Restart the TV now?
Failed to find new software on the air.

Software update. A new recommended software will be available at %s. The update might take some time and the screen might go black. Do not turn off the receiver during the update. If you accept this update, please leave TV on or in standby mode at the scheduled time. Do you want to accept this update?

Software update. A new recommended software update may exist in another channel. If you agree to download it, it may change to the channel automatically. Would you like to do it now? It will start automatically in %s second(s)
Warning: During the process, please do not unplug the TV set power cable as this will lead to a defective TV set.
You have entered a wrong password three times!\10Please wait for about 15 minutes...
Please input channel number or channel name.
This type has no channels. Please select other types.
The firmware is successfully updated.\10Please restart the TV set to activate the new firmware.
Are you sure that you want to update the firmware?
Failed to download firmware from network.
Failed to update.\10Please restart the TV set to download the firmware again.
Failed to update.\10Would you like to retry?
Failed to update. Please insert the USB.\10Would you like to retry?
USB dongle is not ready. Please plug it and try again.
There is some problem with the USB dongle.
Available space of your USB dongle is not enough.
Please DO NOT unplug the USB dongle or turn off the TV set during firmware updating!
There is not enough space. The disk should have a minimum of 1 G free space.

LiveTV combines the experience of traditional TV channels with streaming channels provided by apps. \10\10Get started by setting up the channel sources already installed, or browse the online store for more apps that offer live channels.
The power will be turned off.
The TV channels have changed; press OK to scan for updates.
No signal. The power will be turned off.
